mapper.select: select id, userid, optionid, username, answertime from answer where optionid = #{optionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into answer (id, userid, optionid, username, answertime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{answertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
